context: Hi, how are you? I'm fine thanks! I am a huge Leonardo Dicaprio fan! Can you recommend any movies?
I'm doing great! I love Leonardo also. How about The Revenant (2015) ? Did you see that? It won awards.
YES!! It is my favorite movie actually! I also really enjoyed The Basketball Diaries (1995). Have you seen that?
resp: Also, an oldie but goodie would be What's Eating Gilbert Grape (1993) . I think that movie was severely underrated. Dicaprio was amazing in that role. I have seen The Basketball Diaries (1995) . It was good. Oh, my ALL TIME FAVORITE Dicaprio movie has to be Catch Me If You Can (2002) .

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific type of movie or genre?

I'm easily bored with movie recommendations. I'm looking for something more engaging and exciting, like a suspenseful and intense criminal film, an emotional and thought-provoking drama, and an intriguing and suspenseful mystery.
context.feelings: I hope the recommender understands that I easily get bored with movie recommendations. I really want something more engaging and exciting, like a suspenseful and intense criminal film, an emotional and thought-provoking drama, and an intriguing and suspenseful mystery. Can you tell me more about "The Usual Suspects (1995)"? I'd like to know about the storyline and how it fits into the genres I'm looking for.
context.feelings: I'm not sure if "The Usual Suspects" covers all the genres I'm looking for. I need to ask for more details about the movie before deciding. The recommender seems to understand my preferences, but I'll have to see if this recommendation truly fits what I'm looking for.

context.content: "The Usual Suspects (1995)" is a gripping crime thriller that follows the story of a group of criminals who are brought together for a heist. The film is filled with suspense, mystery, and intense plot twists that will keep you engaged and on the edge of your seat. It perfectly fits into the genres you're looking for, offering a combination of suspenseful criminal elements and intriguing mystery.

Hmm, "The Usual Suspects (1995)" sounds intriguing with its criminal storyline and suspenseful mystery. Can you tell me more about the emotional and thought-provoking aspects of the movie? I want to make sure it really captures my interest before I decide.
context.feelings: I'm not sure if "The Usual Suspects (1995)" will be emotionally and thought-provoking enough for me. I need something that really tugs at my heartstrings while keeping me on the edge of my seat. The recommender did a good job explaining the movie, but I'm not fully convinced yet. I need more information before making a decision.

context.content: "The Usual Suspects (1995)" also delves into the emotional and thought-provoking aspects through its complex characters and their motivations. The film explores themes of trust, betrayal, and the blurred lines between truth and deception, which adds depth and emotional resonance to the storyline. It will definitely keep you engaged on an emotional and intellectual level.

That sounds really interesting. I appreciate the detailed information about "The Usual Suspects (1995)". It seems to cover the suspenseful criminal, emotional drama, and intriguing mystery aspects I'm looking for. I think I'll accept this recommendation. [END]
context.feelings: I'm glad "The Usual Suspects (1995)" seems to have the intense criminal storyline and suspenseful mystery I'm looking for. The emotional and thought-provoking aspects also sound promising. I think the recommender did a good job in understanding my preferences and recommending a movie that aligns with them.
